Class Desert

java.lang.Object
  Environment
      Desert

public class Desert
extends Environment

The desert is essentially a container for the snake and the current mouse.

resolve

public void resolve()
Check to see if the snake head has reched the mouse. If that's the case, replace the mouse with a new one.

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
a string representation of desert: use:
  • " " for empty space
  • the string representation of the snake head
  • "m" for the mouse
if snake head and mouse overlap, only draw the snake head
